name: Delirium (itch) (DuskRThorn)
description:
Controls

WASD - Move

F - Flashlight

ESC - Pause

SHIFT - Run

TAB - Inventory

E - Read Paper

You wake up in an asylum, you have no clue where you are or how you got here. As you move around you hear growling from deeper within. A piece of paper on the ground sparks your interest, are there others? 

Made By: Alex Weaver, Daniel Spetz, Bernard Russ, Jonathan Todd, and Savannah Halstead
